channel.title: Graphics section rules
channel.description:
Essentially, these rules work identically to the ones in the models section. That is,
[ol][li][url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,354311.0.html]Global forum rules[/url] apply[/li] [li]If you wish to request something or need help, please use the child board 'Graphics Requests/Help'[/li] [li]Post only your own work, unless you have permission to repost it (be sure to cite that permission)[/li][/ol]
Feel free to post any suggestions or comments on either of these graphics boards in this topic. We'll be happy to answer questions and discuss changes.

item.title: Graphics section rules
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Essentially, these rules work identically to the ones in the models section. That is,

[ol][li]Global forum rules apply[/li]
[li]If you wish to request something or need help, please use the child board ‘Graphics Requests/Help’[/li]
[li]Post only your own work, unless you have permission to repost it (be sure to cite that permission)[/li][/ol]

Feel free to post any suggestions or comments on either of these graphics boards in this topic. We’ll be happy to answer questions and discuss changes.

Read full topic
